data.title: 5 ultra-expensive assets owned by Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan, who have a combined net worth of over Rs 1000+ Crore
data.meta_description: Popular Bollywood couple Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan are reported to have a combined net worth of over Rs 1,050 crore
data.text:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan are one of the most popular couples in the Hindi film industry. The couple got married in a private ceremony on April 20, 2007, at Amitabh Bachchan's bungalow, Prateeksha. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan are also one of the wealthiest couples in the country. Scroll down to check their combined net worth, and the expensive assets they own.

Combined net worth

According to a CNBC TV18 report, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan has an estimated net worth of Rs 776 crore. On the other hand, Abhishek Bachchan has a personal wealth of Rs 280 crore, according to a News18 report. The combined wealth of the Bollywood couple is around Rs 1,056 crore.

Expensive assets Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan own

A palatial villa in Dubai

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan own a palatial villa in one of the poshest areas of Dubai, Jumeirah Golf Estates. The luxurious property boasts an outdoor swimming pool, a modern kitchen, a private golf course, a spacious walk-in closet, and other top-class amenities.

Real estate investment in Mumbai

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan have an impressive real estate portfolio. Apart from the five luxurious bungalows that the Bachchan family owns, the couple has bought multiple plush apartments in premium residential towers in Mumbai.

One of their properties is located in Bandra-Kurla Complex's premium residential project, Signature Island. According to an Economic Times report, the Bachchans had spent Rs 21 crore to purchase this 5-BHK apartment in 2015. According to an Architectural Digest report, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan also own a luxurious apartment on the 37th floor of Skylark Towers in Worli.

Multiple sports teams

Abhishek Bachchan has an impressive financial portfolio. Apart from real estate, he has also invested in sports and owns two teams: a Pro Kabaddi team named Jaipur Pink Panthers and an Indian Super League team named Chennaiyin FC. The actor is often spotted cheering for his team from the stands.

Rolls Royce Ghost

The Bollywood couple is one of the few celebrities in the Hindi film industry to own a Rolls Royce. According to various online reports, they spent around Rs 7.95 crore to buy a Rolls Royce Ghost. The British-manufactured supercar comes with a powerful twin-turbo V12 engine which is capable of propelling the ride over 200 km/h in just a few seconds.

Bentley Continental GT and other luxurious supercars

Bentley Continental GT is another British-manufactured supercar parked in the couple's garage. According to Cartoq, it was a gift from their close family friend and politician Amar Singh. Other expensive cars owned by Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan are Mercedes-Benz GL63 AMG, Mercedes-Benz S-Class S350D, Audi 8L, Lexus LX 570, and Mercedes-Benz S500, among others.
